Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 3 Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka » 3.3 Kusalattika, Sanidassanaduka » 3.3.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccanīya
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Sanidassanaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Hetu-ārammaṇa
14.
1130Kusalo anidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1131Akusalo anidassano dhammo akusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1132Abyākato anidassano dhammo abyākatassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
15.
1133Kusalo anidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1134Akusalo anidassano dhammo akusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1135Abyākato anidassano dhammo abyākatassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
16.
1136Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta…pe…  upanissaye nava…pe…  avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1137(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
